title: "OECD updates definition of Artificial Intelligence ‘to inform EU’s AI Act’"
excerpt: "The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development's (OECD) Council on Wednesday (8 November) adopted the new definition of Artificial Intelligence that is set to be incorporated in the EU’s new AI rulebook."
